items.sentence: Tom said he assumed that you wouldn't do that.
How exactly are Tom and I supposed to do that?
I don't think Tom would permit you to do that.
I don't think there's any way Tom can do that.
I have no idea why Tom didn't want to do that.
I have no idea why Tom wanted Mary to do that.
I shouldn't have agreed to ask Tom to do that.
I'm not as interested in doing that as Tom is.
I'm the one who told Tom not to do that again.
Please ask Tom if he's going to do that today.
